nodes.text: Bidor Ferrouz, Imperial governor of the remote Candoras sector, had a wife as of eight months after the Battle of Yavin. Together, they had a six-year-old daughter. Alien warlord Nuso Esva kidnapped Ferrouz's wife and daughter as part of a plot to force the governor into treason against the Empire, but both hostages were eventually rescued by Mara Jade.
